long_description: Made for fast and light adventures, the featherweight Exped Lightning 45 Pack multitasks on a wide variety of outdoor adventures with comfort, durability and excellent motion control. Quick-adjust "T-Rex" suspension system features minimal contact points, excellent ventilation and perfect load transfer via a central aluminum stay anchored to the hipbelt. Extremely light top-loading design features a roll-top closure for easy access and weather protection; minimal seams save weight and add water resistance. Stretch-fabric pockets on the pack body and hipbelt keep often-used items within easy reach. Combined full-body side and front compression system stabilizes the load and takes up extra volume. Hydration-compatible design features external access to an inner pocket that doubles as an exit port for hydration tubes (reservoir sold separately). The Exped Lightning 45 Pack sports ice-tool and trekking-pole loops for lashing gear to the outside.
short_description: Made for fast and light adventures, the featherweight Exped Lightning 45 Pack multitasks on a wide variety of outdoor adventures with comfort, durability and excellent motion control.
